subject: Re: [Request received] ONC - Urgent: New Education Article
preview: ##- Please type your reply above this line -##  Hello WolfIQ Support,  We'd love to hear what you think of our customer service. Please take a moment to answer one simple question by clicking the link

full_threads.body:
##- Please type your reply above this line -##

Hello WolfIQ Support,

We'd love to hear what you think of our customer service. Please take a moment to answer one simple question by clicking the link below:

https://support.combinate.me/requests/30458/satisfaction/new/s6JZht3hv2gf5797j6hYcCeCT?locale=1176

Here's a reminder of what your ticket was about:

----------------------------------------------

Jenn Nebres, 18 Jun 2025, 10:07 GMT+10

Thanks, Allie.
You can close this ticket.

Regards,
Jenn

Combinate
support@combinate.me
www.combinate.me
1300 247 018

----------------------------------------------

WolfIQ Support, 18 Jun 2025, 08:10 GMT+10

Hi Combinate,

Thanks for checking in! The actual time this took was 18 minutes.

Let us know if you need anything else.



Thanks,

**Allie Borcena**
support@wolfiq.com.au

![wolfiq.com.au](https://lh3.google.com/u/0/d/1m3NYUuXtUVyZ313zB6byGDnpd4zEEcb2=w3024-h1646-iv2)
**Impressed with our service? Click here to review us on Google!**

Your website Care Plan includes Developer Time, which is used to complete your requests. The included time varies across our plans:

- Lite Care Plans - 15 minutes / month
- Pro Care Plans - 120 minutes / month
- Expert Care Plans - 300 minutes / month
If you require extra Developer Time to complete this request, it will be billed at $129/hr inc GST. **_Please let us know if you would like a quote before we commence your request._**


{#HS:2970985231-156778#} ![](https://secure.helpscout.net/notification/convo/read/2970985231/9046082632/)

Thanks, team!

Before we close this ticket, can I please know how much time was used to complete this request?
The original estimate provided was 15 minutes.


Regards,
Jenn

Combinate
support@combinate.me
www.combinate.me
1300 247 018

----------------------------------------------

Hi Combinate,

Thanks for submitting your request. Confirming we have now made it live and they are ready for you to review.

Here is the link: https://www.oncobeta.com.au/education/

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

**Quick note:** If you have a new concern or an additional task related to a previous ticket, please send it through in a new email. This helps us keep things clear and respond more efficiently.



Thanks,

**Allie Borcena**

We are really sorry about that, it shouldn’t have gone live. We’ve reverted it straight away and it’s now back in draft.

My apologies for the mix-up.

Thanks,

**Allie Borcena**
